attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ever since gordon brown came to office he has done nothing but lie to us. he promised to cut taxes but raised them. he promised us a better economy, our economy could not be any worse. he put us in one of if not the worse recessions this country has ever seen. he promised us jobs but gave them to foreign workers 1st.gordon brown back stabbed tony blair just to get his job to boost his own ego! thats not grounds for a good prime minister.brown has lied & cheated us far to long, he must go urgently.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
